CIRCULAR   NO.  09/2006 
 
Subject: 
Installation of Online X-ray baggage screening system at the 
airports in India. 
 
In order to prevent explosives or any other dangerous devices which may 
be used to commit an act of unlawful interference, from being introduced by any 
means whatsoever on board an aircraft engaged in civil aviation operations, 
online-X-ray baggage screening system shall be installed at all airports served 
by civil commercial flights in a phased manner by the concerned airport operator 
in the manner as mentioned below: 
 
(i) 
In the first phase, online-X-ray baggage screening system shall be 
installed at all 17 international airports (list enclosed) at the earliest. 
 
(ii) 
Trained and BCAS certified screeners shall be deployed for operation of 
the on line-X-ray baggage screening system. 
 
(iii) 
Standards for online-X-ray baggage screening system have already been 
specified by the BCAS vide Circular No. 25/2004 dated 27.12.2004. 
 
(iv) 
Installation of online-X-ray baggage screening system shall be done in 
consultation with the concerned RDCOS, BCAS, Aircraft Operator and In-
charge airport management. 
 
(v) 
Action taken report shall be sent by the Airport Operator to the BCAS Hqrs 
from time to time. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Encl: List of International airports
